context.phaseGoal: Build standalone marketing website with Next.js

userStories.title: Initialize Next.js marketing site
userStories.description: Create Next.js app for marketing website with Tailwind CSS. Run: npx create-next-app@latest marketing --typescript --tailwind --app
acceptanceCriteria: marketing/ directory created with Next.js App Router
npm run dev starts on port 3001
npm run build produces production build

userStories.title: Build marketing landing page
userStories.description: Create public landing page with hero section and key features.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section with value proposition: 'AI-Powered Prior Auth Intelligence'
CTA buttons: Start Free Trial, Schedule Demo

userStories.title: Create pricing page with tier comparison
userStories.description: Build pricing page showing three subscription tiers.
acceptanceCriteria: Three tier cards: Essentials ($299), Professional ($599), Enterprise ($999)
Most popular badge on Professional tier

userStories.title: Create shared navigation and footer
userStories.description: Build navigation header and footer for marketing site.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation with logo, links (Features, Pricing, About), and CTA button
Footer with company info, links, and copyright
